ChangeNote: Added functionality to the setup of the tests
Failing unit test has been fixed.
Internal. Test fix
No impact on clients. Changes in internal testing framework
Fix possible crash when pricing FRA templates
The issue has been fixed by adding a disposed guard
Fix flaky unit test.
Internal tests change, no effect on clients
Fixes the issue with deleted data source mappings on Partial Deploy
Fixed an error in the Compliance Post Trade Monitor that can lead to a crash after compliance validations have finished.
The authorisation profiles will now automatically be updated with missing entries in internal installations.
Search  for rules in Compliance Manager - Rules should not return deleted rules.
After implementing this change, the disabled fields will stay the same after saving.
Corrects incorrect Portfolio calculation cash flow for ABSs having a Bullet structure, when using a Maturity convention.
Internal cleanup to make batch task code easier to maintain.
Fix issues with upload/download to sub folders of logical folders
Fixing a rare occurring issue that caused a crash when a user-written formula was used in the Hedge Ratio Defition
Updated data for PositionResults Integration test and change the tag to L2/L3
This is only internal changes that will not affect customer.
Fixed a rare occurring crash that happened if a layout contained formulas and graphs that were based on UDKRs
3T - Technical
In "Asset Manager" the context  menu "Modify position" is implemented for the Repo instrument.
Correction in internal test function. No change to be delivered to customer

When a new user is created and added to a user group, or when an existing user is moved from one user group to another,  the user will henceforth automatically inherit all trading rules currently assigned to the user group to which the user is added.
Internal change: Add developer tool to hotswap OCaml process
Removed flaky GUI integration test that was of little use.
Create initial support for a 2-legged CDS index rollover. The first leg is an open contract and the second leg is a close contract.
3T - Technical

The trace functionality in the portfolio calculation has been expanded to log trace information for the "Missing data from table HOLDINGMATCH" error message types. It is enabled in the "Trace" sub-window of the portfolio calculation; or in the "Calculations" page of the Miscellaneous options.
Add configurations so that UTM is able to decide on strategy & limits  to be used
It allows user to create additional instruments at external client trade windows
Fixed an issue in Realtime Infrastructure service that caused certain requests to cause a re-read of data from the db.  This could lead to the service being more busy than necessary

A database error occurred if starting the same 'Cleanup Performance Measurement Results' definition twice in batch with the 'Do not check if calculation is running' batch option checked. This has been corrected.
Contract Context Cache is implemented for OTC Web API on service Implementation side to reuse contract contexts and speed up the execution.
Renamed prefixes of entities created by tests to prevent the interference of tests.
N/A
event propagation after definition cleanup was added
Some pre trade results indirectly or potentially affected by a simulation or an order was not available to see. This is now fixed.
Technical changes. No change in functionality.
Standard system logs (such as batch.log, service.log...) will now use unified system logging if  enabled.

The portfolio calculation could fail with the "Missing data from table tHOLDINGMATCH." error message, when the portfolio calculation simulated credit loss allowance and end-of-period adjustment transactions using the NAIC functionality.  The error could occur when the real transactions of the same positions were e.g. raised in status at the same time. The error has been corrected. Additionally, the waiting time for the recalculation logic in the front office portfolio calculations has been increased to 20 and 40 seconds for the two recalculation attempts.
Added 34 SpecFlow tests to check authorization, unsupported instrument types, validation of incoming xml document for import and transaction number for export
Cover General Reconciliation Fields with brick for testing purposes.
Add Export operation for External Cash flow window
The Investment Analytics Service Data Source Configuration window has been re-organised by introducing a Portfolio tab page and a Benchmark tab page. This is a purely cosmetic GUI change.
Added a service checker that will force the service to restart should it enter an unrecoverable deadlock
Crash in Performance Calculation with no dividends found for PCL framework. Error was fixed.
GetReverseDependencies operation was implemented for Middle Office Position Selection form
Can now save setup when DV calculation is set to either: Benchmark, Difference to Bm2 or Relative to Bm2. without giving error message
Add Collateral Calculation Controller service to the "Cloud icon" for monitoring status of Collateral related services in the Margin Manager
Test data for OTC Web  API added
Response to the audit request sent via AzSB messaging contains total number of audit messages for a given entity.
fix flacky test by changes in test code. no changes for customer.
Reduced number of APL calls during OOB order load for approval fields and FX

The Oracle quota for DB UP test users/schema was lifted form 50M to unlimited. The 50M was there that we do not make to big test data for testing UP as the test data was created each time. This will be revisited on another story and this change is to make MG running again.
Introducing record-based authorization for Trade Control Conditions window
An error message was corrected.
The import of CAS documents now results in data in the database
CustomerApplyNote: The import of CAS documents now results in data in the database

ChangeNote: Unit test has been updated.
For FUNDS dependencies to FUNDFIGAPMAP wasnt declared correctly (declared as table dependencies instead of configuration dependencies). This has been corrected.
No impact on clients. Changes in internal testing framework
Fix of flaky test.
Improve error reporting for convertible bonds
Add a date field to AM cache tables to support historical queries
Internal codebase refactoring. Fixed the code to avoid synchronization issues when checking restrictions.
Code refactored for better understanding and removal of existing AFC errors.
Enhance Trade Manager to support Standard Products

Internal codebase refactoring. Fixed the code to improve how the system will work in the future after further changes, which in the very end will positively affect performance. Changes made to the code do not affect system behaviour.
Internal tests change, no effect on clients
An issue was discovered where Payment date was wrongly reset in Collateral Reallocations window. This has been fixed.
In Netting Manager, total sum of Payment QC and Payment PC are displayed in absolute value
Fix position scope at PS if we modify simulation for holding with Bm + Bm2 position scope
Fixed crash when My Layout was not saved on first application start up
It is now possible to export layouts from sub forms.
Fixed generation of daily cashflow for yield used in mathematical adjustment for bonds with redemption on non-coupon dates and bonds with zero coupon payments.

When Accrued interest unsettled QC/PC amounts are calculated per tax lot in a Portfolio calculation and the Accrued interest dissolution principle is set to Immediate and Accrued interest should be calculated per tax lot, then dead tax lots with zero nominal are now taken into account when calculating the unsettled amounts.
States of UP Environment objects are  logged to telemetry, every time some of the state properties are accessed. This has changes, so not we only put state-changes into telemetry.
Cover functions for the identification of the unique preliminary figure attributes for fund and portfolio services costs respectively.
This is a technical change for internal tooling, with no impact on business functionality.
This defect is a duplicate of D-77036
Compliance manager will now reflect when user has been removed or changed user group so that correct users are shown when loading Rule entry for trading rules.
Rounding was missing in the calculation of current value QC for the CDS index option instrument in the Trade Manager
Manual test of the flow in TM for an IRS, OIS with Daily Fixings
Unit tests are now running in Merge Gate as L1 tests
NA
Convertation from Strings to Domsins was modified.  This will solve the problem with Transaction API service and SpecFlow tests.
Number of Flexible Analytics Calculations for Calculation and Explain requests is implemented for Telemetry.

CustomerApplyNote: When 'underwritingID' from the external forecast data file doesn't match a SimCorp model portfolio ID, then the external forecast data is imported with 'Import status' Error and the model portfolio fields are not filled.

ChangeNote: For the Loan Facility instrument in the Trade Manager, "Transaction code" and "Has unsettled facility contracts" have been added to the input parameter list for the function calculating Unpaid accrued interest QC.
Internal. Flaky unit test fixed
Sometimes Communication mediator service would not reload properly after 'Reload' button was hit.  This has been fixed.
Make tests independent on environment and mark them as L0
Enabled Rescale benchmarks setting in the Asset manager for the 2nd benchmark.
Asset Manager Asset Allocation Applet update issue was fixed.
For full update all files in the netroot/bin folder is deleted before applying the new media.
Data Clean-up service crashes with ORA-02292 in compliance cleanup
An error could occur when creating 'Payments' i the 'Reconciliation Manager' in case more than one payment instructions were to be reconciled. This has been fixed.
Loan Facility intraday booking on nominal level (Sell after existing Paydowns)
Technical - 3T
New interface functions create to write to unified system logging.
The system admin now have to setup a location for the FO trace files. And all FO trace settings have been moved to Support Options / Front Office.
New DataSet for AIDE_MASTER_AZ (no customer impact, update of internal installation)
This change introduces to the NOMA APIs a new command which will enable updates to the order free codes attached to an order.
Save As button in a number of forms did not work in 3T. Now a file with a generated filename will be downloaded to the Download folder in 3T.
CA Dashboard: ORA-01628 max # extents reached for rollback segment. Was fixed
Make tests independent on environment and mark them as L0

CustomerApplyNote: Add posibility to apply "Auto-fill rules" manualy via button from the Recon Manager

ChangeNote: Technical - 3T
It is now possible to see if any batch jobs has failed in a batch job group execution in the batch history widget.
Enhance Trade Manager to support Standard Products

The cash balances per agreement date in the portfolio calculation running on a period closure framework were not correct after applying privileges to reversed and active cash payments. Specifically when only the period closure agreement date was changed. The error has been fixed. Now period closure system reversals of reversed cash payments are made when there are changes in any of the period closure dates including the period closure agreement date.
Fixed an error in the Asset Manager, where the position sign of historical model portfolio and benchmark positions was wrong.
WIP: Introduces endpoints for searching for trades and orders in the OTC Web API. With this change only with dummy data. Endpoints introduced as a new API family as they will utilize OData querying
Added validation on dates logic for FX Option, vanilla
While saving post-trade results InMemory objects were populated and forwarded to the alerts handler.
Fixed error when Trade Manager would very occasionally crash on start-up due to a race condition
Moved reading xcomWhere to TmsExe and use as input argument of SC10
Reserve and release database connection when needed in 3T.
Internal tests restructuring, no effect on clients
Reading from cnf.ini and ins.ini has been removed from the database interface delivery. Instead values are passed as arguments.
Error occured when Collateral Event Resolver service was shutting down. Error was fixed.
Now the incident will be generated if AM cache service is crashing
Added Portfolio Calculation fields to CurrentPositions and AssetManagerCache API's except PFCStatus and Advanced Accounting View fields
Made autofilter row and Filter Editor work when grid field has custom decimals number applied. 2T grid functionalities
3T - Technical
It is now possible to upload Capital Account Statement documents to the Status Viewer in Document Processing (Alts. Manager)
Added native accounting fields to CurrentPositions and AssetManagerCache API's
NA
Introducing record-based authorization for Cost Default Conditions window
Validation Error case handling - the user is able to see the error message in flex analytics explain validation
Implemented opportunity to import Cash Flow Adjustment Factors entities in XMGR
Replace system exception with a none result, in case of compliance rules that does not produce proper hierarchies for risk calculations
Field configuration gets an enhancment so that Flexible Analytic fields can become selectable/ unselectable for the Asset Manager
AM settings autosave updated
Do not ignore rebase factors for XpressInstruments and OTC
Fixed 500 Internal Server Error when creating a simulation based on dirty value QC using CreateSimulatedOrders API command
Make tests independent on environment and mark them as L0
Error message improved
The analysis date for index CDS components was one day off in the PFC.
Fixed a crash related to the new "Max Age" functionality in the decomposition flow.

A new Contract status domain value has been created, e.g. "Standard Product" as in CONTRACTSTATUS_STDPROD. A new contract table for standard products has also been created, e.g. CONTRACTSTDPROD.

When providing zero QC and LC prices for a TRS basket adjustment in the Trade Manager a rule loop crash has occured. This was fixed.
Added editor list for the Repo instrument in the Modify Position window to use instrument-specific fields "Repo rate" and "Initial margin pct".
A filterobject and an Interface Definition 2496 was created for the window Equity Accounting Adjustments.
The limit module has been set into read-only mode. It won't be possible to run any validations or make changes to the configuration, but it will be possible to view old results.
Catch database errors and do not create incident.

When Settlement defaults are cleared the cache for Settlement fields on Additional Tab contains old information in popup from the previous defaults in External Client Trade window. Now the issue has been fixed.
This change add the files we want as be part of the UP nuget package  lib folder
Change impacts our internal Verification Pipeline
3T - Technical
Make database select faster when looking up FOHoldings on Asset Manager Calculation service

Added validation logic limiting the selection of the fields "Management Company", "Administrater", "Overlay Manager", and "Securities lending agent" on the "Portfolios" and "Portfolio Groups", to only accept Party of the relevant type.

Added copying functionality, such that for new portfolios, the fields "Management Company", "Administrater", "Overlay Manager", and "Securities lending agent" are inherited from the portfolio group, when that is filled in.
3T specific technical changes.
Upgrade RestSharp from 108.0.3 -  to version RestSharp - 112.0.0
3T - Technical
A new Contract status domain value has been created, e.g. "Standard Product" as in CONTRACTSTATUS_STDPROD. A new contract table for standard products has also been created, e.g. CONTRACTSTDPROD.
No behavior is changed for clients. Technical refactoring is done to fix internal architectural issues in Settlement.Dashboard project
[Technical] Refactored validators in Collateral.Transaction project
Introducing record-based authorization for Cost Defaults window
The pair of CDS index option instrument subtype and Open transaction type is now linked to a new Trade Manager CDS index option open form.

During the performance calculation upload results batch job, there was a problem that we were searching for pEXPCOMPTYPE in tHOLKEYS which does not exist in that table. This only happened in certain cases. Now we look in tPERFORMCALC instead
Fixed 2 known issues for FpML documents import and export.
Azure.Messaging.ServiceBus library was updated to version 7.18.1 in OM. Logic of managing the topics was moved to OMB project.
Exposure is now calculated for CDS components.
Technical - 3T
Adjustment factor might be updated when doing data import to External Cash Flow window
Load endpoint descriptions from MD files rather than in-code strings
Increased test coverage for EA functionality
This enables simultanious deletion of linked Trade date sells and Settle Sell transactions from the Transaction Status Form when Payment reconciliation is linked to cash management.
After discussion with team a skeleton was developed that helps to understand the data flow for creation/updating alerts using InMemory objects. New stories were created.

Added two investor lookup rules:  "Parties - Using Management Company link on Portfolios" and "Parties - Using Management Company link on Portfolio Groups" that can be selected in the form "Investor Mapping" for both "Investor lookup rule" and  "Investor firm lookup rule"
Added new L3 tests
Flaky unit test has been fixed.
Currency precedence in FX simulation defaults will now be used when creating FX simulations with simulation macros.
3T - Technical
It wasn't possible to import GLACCOUNT’s referring itself, either directly or via a second GLACCOUNT. This has been corrected.
Add base CS01 key ratio to PKR C# layer
Trying to execute the Bond New Issue flow in the Asset Manager would lead to a crash.

In Rule Entry, properties which usually require an input dialog, such as ISIN or CUSIP, should pop up a selection list, when used with a List or External List. This had stopped working, but has now been fixed.
Performance optimization of grid data processing. Web UC

CustomerApplyNote: Crash in specific export/import for Data Import Setup window. Was fixed

ChangeNote: Internal tests restructuring, no effect on clients

For security reasons it is not allowed to use a common log directory. A number of applications have been changed to use %TEMP%, the maintenance directory, or write to the database. See release note for further info.
Fix to prevent system manager from shutting down, when compliance override alerts are not accessible.

Reading data from Long Term Storage was achieved that matches the data from Oracle. The comparison of two objects that are created based on database and LTS sources, does not show any discrepancies. It means that they can be substitutable.
NA
Availability of "Full risk analytics details" in Rule entry now affected by risk measures inside formulas
All split fields (not a limited number as it used to be) are considered for the holding calculation

The Base Filter (1521) for import of 'Portfolio Management\Multi Analyses\Key Ratios\View Key Ratios' information has been updated to SC Standard
1 field was added:
Field 2740: CS01 Rule ID= 340
Technical - 3T
Added retry on delete of APL core form temporary file.
AddComments command is available in AzSB messaging
It is now possible to place an order in  OM with mandatory compliance check, if the compliance check has been suspended
Moved logic of opening new screen in dock layout from client to server. Web UC
Will now reconnect and retry if database connection is lost during scdUpdate while creating package for database user.
Correction in calculation of Notice Date when current trade date is a Bank Holiday
Optimization of the opening/closing of fields in the Portfolio Sheet
The external forecast data file can now contain an underwritingID which will be matched with a SimCorp model portfolio when importing.
Fill Payment Date and Security ID in alert
CustomerApplyNote: Add Security ID and Payment Data to TPD alerts

ChangeNote: UserRolePrefix has been added as cnf.ini config parameter
Migrate existing libraries to the API Framework data layer
Fixed a system performance issue in Compliance that can occur if a lot of “Pool to Portfolio” mappings exist.
Fix interlally reported SonarQube issue when comparing floating point number to zero
GetDependencies and Delete operations were implemented for Middle Office Position Selection form
Program error happened wile updating Carried redeemed tax free nominal in Opening Balance transactions. That has been fixed now.
Ensured fields are open for input for certain types of sub-forms in three tier.
Projects restructuring
There was a mistake  while doing refactoring of transGenVire_ImlLegs function. This was corrected.
N/A - Internall code changes to make code follow DDD approach - resilient to unintended side effects.
Internal test for Portfolio service cost setup

A new button named "Copy" is available in Asset Viewer Ribbon (under the DATA section) which allows copying assets. Asset details including Fund data, Property data and, Company data are copied which then can be saved as a new asset.
Add CS01 to the key ratio calculation
Cleanup of old code, that prevents test tool version upgrade.
Improve a unit test
Create new  service: 'Collateral calculation controller'
Validating data for Database parameters
Added fields for Recovered currency appreciation/depreciation on P/L window for the Tax lot combined adjustment
As a trader, if I place an order to a platform that doesn't support that asset class/instrument type, the order is not sent and I receive feedback (NOMA only)

The fix is to make the cash details displayed  for bank account and cash bucket is consistent for a transaction with payment date same as balance date and for the payment date one day before the balance date
Fixed a failing DWH Partial Deploy when a target DWH Model didn't have a schema applied.
Internal codebase refactoring. Fixed the code to improve all OTC instruments. Changes made to the code do not affect system behaviour.
Fix is to allow user to import Funds Certificates when Settlement Days value is null (Ext Settlement Days is not checked)
A rare problem, having to do with implicit join, was fixed in the internal database layer.
New 'Log path' parameter added to 'Service Options / Middle Office Position Calculation' to avoid the default use of 'log' (security issue).
The size of an hidden internal key field was increased to avoid running out of unique keys.

When using the 'Document processing reconciliation check' auxiliary job for bank reconciliation the right SWIFT address were not picked up if the the bank account SWIFT address were configured using segments in the 'Parties\Interfaces\SWIFT' window.
A change has been made now allowing the segments to be used.

It is now possible to set the reference Rate Convention to Par yield for other instruments than MIT bonds if the Fixing Frequency results in a longer period than the period for the Payment Frequency. Previously this was not possible as an error message would be issued telling “The reference rate convention for this reference rate cannot be PARYIELD when adjusting fixing frequency is set.
Added possibility to use Modify Position window for the Repo instrument.
Implementation of dynamic codes
We’ve added a new column, Preliminary Figures, which denotes the preliminary figure attribute, to manage preliminary figures for both funds and portfolio figure attributes.
timestamp in om3_de_orders is updated after an order is parked
Add Import operation for Middle Office External Values form window
In installations with enforced portfolio master, the Online compliance applets don't show any results because of wrongly evaluated auth. on the Online service. This has been fixed.
Technical - 3T
No changes to business logic, refactoring

In the period after midnight, where the pre-trade- and post-trade services are refreshing their internal caches, we will allow validations to be performed. These validations will be slower than normal validations as they will be querying the DB where they normally access a service cache for the data.
Two projects were created (and tests written) for Logical Form Tests - one devoted to Lending mark field on different forms, other to saving Tax Lot Correction transaction
This is an internal change. The change has no customer impact.
CustomerApplyNote: This is an interal change. The change has no customer impact.

ChangeNote: Implemented prototype for PDF documents generation that will be used for printing data in 3T

There was an error in Benchmark Calculation when executing the type 'Update Index/Benchmark using Segment'. The indexes in the benchmark segment was not correctly identified. The error has been corrected.
Technical - 3T

Base Mart DEXes with and without schema attached are treated as equal after Copy in Merge Models window. Cleanup of orphan DEXes after Copy is enforced. Copy process of DEXes with one single sub-query join has been fixed.
Implemented opportunity to return all Middle Office Position Selection entities in XMGR
Create pointers for CS01
The field names of the new party fields in portfolios and portfolio groups were aligned with the field names in the base filters.

Rename scale up/down to in/out
Also CodeGenerator package is updated to get latest namings to auto generated service files
This  change remove a possible crash that could occur in the Performance Measurement when FB FIPA is enabled.
Corrected flaky tests

Performance optimized getting CashDetails API call
'Rounding Rules' with 'Field to be rounded' set to 'Nominal redemption' did not work anymore. This has been fixed.
Test suite for mPOSRCAUTOFILLRULES functions  has been changed to L0 - mockup added for one of the variables used in internal function
GetDependencies and Delete operation was implemented for External Cash flow form
a few Sonar Qube issues fixed. Technical, no change in business cases.
Making the "Paydown Out Unset" payments a partial reversal of the payment amount from the trade date sell transaction
Fixed issue with showing labels in layout groups with checkboxes
An error could occur when trying to load a bond having 'Fixings' and a 'Reference rate' with  'Rate convention' 'Par yield' into the  'Edit Multiple Securities - Bonds'  window. This has been fixed.
To make it easier to make "usable" ID's the maximum width of the batch job, batch job group, and reference file have been changed to 30.
This change corrects a possible error in the  Performance Calculation in the calculation of the TWR based FIPA local return that could occur at maturity for swaps.

Fixing failing integration test

When opening a CDS index option template from the OTC Simulation applet in the Asset Manager a crash would occur as CDS index option was not a valid instrument subtype in this context. The error has been fixed.

Remove calling Action log, when Middle office manager is started
Enabled IData queries using SQLNames
The not so useful telemetry information has been removed to avoid spamming.
Reduce memory use when assigning pricing keys
This is a client specific fix for a client to address rounding issues

In a very specific case, a placement on an aggregated order, where part of the bundle required override and compliance override, and the other did not required any override, the bundle status was blocked, so that the placement could not proceed after all overrides were complete and accepted. This has now been resolved.
Enable external client trade creation from Asset manager (sim-transactions flow) for additional instrument types: GDR/ADR, Index certificate, Right, Bond, Index Bond, ABS

Enabled delta vectors in simulation macros
Create an API endpoint prototype in ESD area - no changes for the clients, the code is marked as non-deliverable

Mainly internal codebase refactoring. Basing Field Values in the Typelet methods on GuiValue type instead of object type. The zero digits .00 of precision values are removed with this change, and in rare cases this impacts tests that reads the precise wording of an error message otherwise the change has no impact on users.
Changes to the internal development tool RuleLog, used for tracing and debugging. Not related to business functioanlity.
Implemented opportunity to return all External Cash flow entities in XMGR
Added functionality to the new XpressInstrument "Multi Tranche Note with Global Switch".
When a new execution-scope is created all databaseconnection-scopes must run under this execution-scope.
Technical: Some forms with tab-pages did not work, as some tab-pages need to reside inside its own logical form to work.
No visible changes for user.
Technical changes. No change in functionality.
Incorrect reinvestment service url retrieved in some installations. Fixed
Sync APL and C# instrument lists for orders in case orders are not installed
internal change, no customer should be affected

Included new mandatory fields (lifetime and TVPI) in the forecast model and validations on (min, base, max)/ (worst, base, best) values in ascending order. Also adjusted the auto tests to include these validations
Technical - 3T
This is a change to internal tools with no impact on business functionality.
Added wrapper for IInfraStructureParameters interface that handles exceptions during property read and write user friendly message

In case when AdjEqAcc transaction date coincides with date of EqAcc data, consequent AdjEqAcc transaction wrongly used this data (which should be already excluded) summing up it with EqAcc data for current transaction leading to cumulative amounts.
Now 'frome date' is shifted to the next day, because AdjEqAcc transaction is 'end of day' and the next one can only be on the next day.
Enable a unit test
The email audit functionality has been removed.
Internal change related to Loan facility Contract Paydown transactions generation. Doesn't affect any customers.
The database load generated by the Trade Processing Dashboard service has been reduced.
It decreases memory consumption at AM in case when we have Bm + Bm2 positions scope only
Internal test, no customer functionality affected.
Field 'line' on reconciliations applet of reconciliation manager was opened by mistake. Now it is closed again
The validation for 'Create Transaction Field Reconfiguration'  did not detect holding key merges in in case 'Managed contract (IK)' were defined on the relevant holdings. This has been fixed.
BuildTool version updated
This change isn't visible to users. Refactoring of SAPI code.
The userts tablespace is no longer checked and verified during update.
Code Improvements in ESG
Implemented opportunity to export Cash Flow Adjustment Factors entities in XMGR

If a  batch jobs used calculation services, and one of the sub-jobs failed, the percentage done could go down and then start to raise again (e.g. from 30% down to 0% and then back to 2%, 3%....). This has been corrected.
Technical refactoring - no behavior changes
Multi-place compliance validated as a block.
Improvement in Forecast Cash Flow Batch Job Log viewer
CA Dashboard service in case having more than 10K publication might crash on Oracle by updating the data. Was fixed
Add logging for Monte-Carlo scenarios pricing in the Risk Price Calculation Batch Job.
Technical changes. No change in functionality.
Error due to domain value happens by transporting a fund extended event. Was fixed
Test in OTC Web API project added
Enhancing the robustness of the code that calculates the book price in quotation and basket currency for Total Return Swaps.
Fixing crash in Yield curve manager that occurs when estimating curve that has several standard contracts with identical maturity dates.
Reenabeling disabled party relation fields on the Portfolio and Portfolio Group forms
Changed PFC comparision tool when new fields added with zero value then no new files generated

Private Debt/Loan Facilities: It should not be possible to modify/delete unsettled sell transaction if followed by linked Paydown Out unsettled transactions.  Succeeding linked transaction and related transactions should be deleted first and remade after modification/deletion. An error message as been added.

Portfolio Calculation: Earlier the system would dump trace files in the log directory if nothing had been specified in ‘Directory for trace files’ (Miscellaneous Options / Calculations). Now the trace will be disabled, and no files will be generated if nothing has been specified.
Fact Compliance Rule Assignment includes de-assigned rules
New AIDE_MASTER_AZ datasets and SpecFlow tests related to TRS OIS funding legs created.
Fixed problem when we can not use .NET formulas argument name like "Issuer"
A saved configuration from the database is now used in Flexible Analytics Configuration Options window instead of overriding it with the default configuration when the package has to be re-onboarded.

For unknown reasons, a crash occurs from time to time during the generation of a netting cancel message.
Additional fetching of information is added to make future analysis easier.
As a trader, the new aggregation behaviour applies to CDS, equities, futures and options only (feature switch)
Update anchored keys on Save has been implemented

Not relevant for customers

Fix problem with match APL unit tests. No changes for the users.
Update of internal SimCorp tool, which does not affect any customer installations.
IMS Standard and Custom model metadata are retrieved based on IMS Standard and IMS Custom Data module state
No visible changes for user. Clean-up Reconciliation repositories structure

Refactoring AUCGT C# engine. No impact on clients
The text of warning message was edited.
New trades and modifications in TM in AIDE_MASTER_AZ to enable SpecFlow tests for CDS Index Option.

Fixed an error where the Portfolio/Fund Administration Manager in the Alarms Inbox Applet would not restrict shown alarms based on the corresponding setup in the Setup Applet.
Trade Manager: Maturity settlement handling for FX Option vanilla hybrid was added here.
Customer specific correction to Performance Calculation related to a special GIPS composite calculation flow.
Optimizations that will speedup a Simulation Macro that uses UDKR's.  Will also generally improve the Portfolio Sheet if it contains UDKRs
Technical: Cleanup of unused code
Au Cgt - test refactoring
Improve markdown files naming convention for Swagger descriptions
When a dependency in a .Net formula attribute has been defined in attribute configuration, the calculation of rules using this formula, will now show the details for the dependent attribute.
Reducing number of calls to read scenario file, and adding more retries
Extended DatabaseDataSource to support grouping calls on foreign key fields
In case error "Temporary server error" happens during sending an email - retry similar to "The operation has timed out" message.
Technical - 3T
Added, result and code for it shared in Conversation panel. Waiting for 25.01 dev main branch .
Disable change decimals for 7 limit properties in online results grid
Fix problems with Collateral RVP. RVP was broken by failed try to exclude API tests from it.
Make bow factor calculation more consistent, by using calculated contribution rates based on private market benchmark data, if available
GetReverseDependencies operation was implemented for Middle Office External Values form
Correct exceptions and response codes in StrategyTagging API
Improve code readability for some native file functions
Update Equity, Futures, Options to show correct reason for not being able to aggregate
Resolved test failure by overriding identity handling in a nested class to bypass domain controller dependency.
Four eye validation would wrongly alert about a change to the transaction - the  solution was to make all necessary data available for the validation to avoid this.

When modifying a Trade Manager CDS index option trade, a crash would occur due to duplication of the Quote type field inside a field list, e.g. it contains both SECURITIES.QUOTETYPE & CDSOPTIONS.QUOTETYPE.
Fixed flaky unit test.
The performance for creating OIS fixings has been improved.
Internal 3T testing change.

When saving a bond, it is no longer validated that the coupon and/or redemption frequency is 6M, when using the EOM Convention 'Last, no leap'. Furthermore any anchor date can be used together with EOM Convention 'Last, no leap'.
Duplicate to D-76587
AxR Position Integration batch job does not support reference dates. Fixed.
internal 3t
IK's with zero for authorization profile were filtered out in the SQL query
For dirty index quoted repos, changing the trade date did update the dirty index quote. This was corrected such that the dirty price is updated instead.
Make APL unit test suite mTEST_MATCHFILTERWEEKLY more stable.
Show cash maturity effects for short term cash instruments (simulations and orders)
Correction of program error found when dividends are generated

When checking the consistency of PCL holdings, the mix of positions with and without the errors led to a program crash on the step of making the error message report. Now it is fixed by aligning the length of faulty fields with the other variables.
Fixed bug in Oracle DataWarehouse when a basemart has hundreds of columns
Added functionality for handling request cancellation
Implemented opportunity to return table dependency from Cash To Security Group Code Map entity to Cash Bucket security in XMGR

After this change SC consultant users will not be changed to server user when processing messages on Order Manager  Messages service. This is needed to avoid errors in allocation transaction creation if OM allocation is done by SC consultant.

Enabling calculation of accrued interest, dirty and clean prices for structured bonds that have such high quote that spread calculation is impossible. Applies to pricing of structured bonds with Quoted price + yield curve, structured products pricing method.
SupportedAdditionalOperators are updated as not to have Year/Month or DaysofWeek operations for datetime fields in RecociliationResultsFilterEditorList
Crash when getting dependencies for GROUPCODEVALS. This has been corrected.
Recover deleted unittests. Made it possible to simulate DV01 and benchmark2 using custom strategies.
LFT's are created to partly cover View Transactions
NA
This regards the ‘Securities Finance Manager’. Some database reference path for tTRANSFACILITY  was missing to an outer join condition in the code that updates the transaction data Container.
It wasn't possible to execute batch jobs when running 3T. This as been corrected.
Technical - 3T
Improved performance of grid component data processing. Web UC
The context menu in fund models grid has been adjustment to see the full context menu.
Fix L2 Api tests hang out
No changes to business logic, refactoring

When using the 'Price method' 'Quoted price + yield curve, structured products' and having 'Use auxiliary market data' checked in the relevant 'Pricing Definition' line the valuation with this 'Pricing method' erroneously failed in case no 'Conv. Adj. vol. curve' was defined on the relevant 'Bond'.

Trade Manager: In some cases when FAP segment for OTC swaps contains created date of the contract, OTC swap transaction, created from Front Office simulation,  could be booked on a wrong FAP line. It has been fixed.
Model Portfolio ID is now available in FIX overrides DSL
Solved on D-76871
Refactoring: use better naming in code for reconciliation save results function
Fix 'Unknown Paramter' error in Model Configuration Parameters window in Data Warehouse Manager
Move 'Collateral Substitution Type' form to Collateral Area
Internal codebase refactoring. Fixed the code to improve discoverability. Changes made to the code do not affect system behaviour.
enable the functionality of  dbOptImplicitJoin  in UP
Fixed second benchmark status message and tooltip in case when first benchmark is missing.
Fix for the discrepancy between delivered files and sysobject meta data for AI.Search.Compliance package to work
Technical changes that will not affect the customers.

The editor in CustomArgumentsEditorListwas all time in new state. As the CustomArgumentsEditorList is custom editor list, it doe not work in CRUD context. Therefore it will not be switch out from new state. In this context the editor list should be set to be not in new state after create.

This was failing as in the one value CustomArgumentsEditorList the default value was 0 and in this case IsNew was honored, which is not case in other cases when the CustomArgumentsEditorList was used.

Forecasts in  the 'Alternative investments manager\Strategy analysis '  page based on existing positions relating from an 'Alternative investments - Internal trade' transaction transferring a position from one portfolio to another were wrong in the year with the transfer. The error has been corrected.
Fixed environment inconsistency between Snowflake and Oracle Loads affecting BD_CALENDAR contents
NA
NA

Previously, if the "Shows checks only for released orders" setting was checked in Front Office options, then placement validations were only shown in the pre-trade monitor if they had a pending Compliance Override request.

This has now been changed so that the setting no longer affects the display of placement validations. All placement validations are always shown in the Pre-trade monitor, regardless of whether or not they require compliance override or the above setting has been checked.
Fixed, Prevent to add same sessions into the databaseSessions
This change is not visible by the user. Refactoring of SAPI code.
Improvement in the Traffic Light Monitor support tool: 1) Better feedback to users (via notifications) and 2) the ability the monitor AM Cache jobs
Technical - 3T
Simplifies implementation details for contribution rates calculation from private market data benchmarks. It should not affect customers.
A field to control the 'Max age' for external components was added but for now hidden to the Decomposition Profile.

With tax buckets, the match calculation, when booking the sell, is done in a different function than usual fifo or lifo.
 Tax bucket was missing a piece of code that prevents errors due to double floating arithmetic issues
scdUpdate is updated to take the WS size specified in cnf.ini into use during update. Previously the setting was overwritten.
Create a POC for the Skywalkers that they can use to validate
It is enable  handling application/xml and text/xml MIME types correctly,
app.config is added again to the  projects instead of using Framework/app.config as a reference
Refactor code surrounding building base service load info
Extra info of SQL logging removed just to be align with 2T file logs. But the original message will be logged on Appinsight.
correcting the validation criteria
Dates formats in Position Analyses are changed to be independent on local date format.
Some unit tests were made more reliable to avoid false fails.
Technical - 3T

Not-In-Use-But-Kept fields is wrongly deleted during upgrade. 

Made some minor change and added more debug information to get wiser next time this error occur.  When it is not possible to update cnf.ini, the upgrade will fail instead of old behaviour that was ignoring the error.
Technical - 3T

There was an internal program error in the Data Import service. With large amounts of data, the service could crash. This has been fixed. As a workaround in versions before this fix, one can lower the number of items processed at once in the service on the Data Import Service Configuration.
Benchmark2 is supported in delta vectors
"More" filter button removed for Rule Search (Beta)
The following fields, have been added to  batch jobs of type "Benchmark Calculation - Upload Results: Benchmark segment, Portfolio segment, From date & To date
A validation has been introduced to ensure that new PCL frameworks cannot be initialized with the same date as existing PCL frameworks, if they have the same parent framework.
Support for 'Portfolio figure approval mappings' and 'Fund figure approval mappings' have been added to the Configuration Service.
Technical - 3T
Reduce potential flakiness in unit tests
Unit tests related to the Security API internal client were enabled in the build process.
Removal of an assertion error in the benchmark area, not affecting any functionality.
State variable used by the initialisation of accounting frameworks have been moved from cnf.ini to the database.

When exporting BLOOMSETUPS the 'Request' state was part of the export/import, and this could lead to problems/warnings. This has been corrected (the 'Request state' has been removed as this is a read only property).

A fix has been made to determine if an active trade indirectly affects a credit risk assignment unit, to ensure that an active transaction on a credit risk assignment unit, which creates an alert on more than one party, will now flag the alerts on all affected parties, as "Active".
Adds unit tests. No visible changes for user.
Internal tests added, no influence on clients flows
Internal codebase refactoring. Fixed the code to improve compactness. Changes made to the code do not affect system behaviour.

Configuration transport: An error was detected in the Compliance Configuration transporter (CMPLCONFIGURATION). The error means that when importing a Compliance Configuration record into a target installation where this does not exist, the new record will not be created correctly in the target installation. This has been fixed.

When saving a Securities Lending Maturity' 'MatRepo' transaction having 'Actual Settlement' data wrongly the error message 'Underlying holdings cannot be found. Try modifying the transaction instead.'  could appear. This has been fixed.
Type 'TRASPEC' (Special Holding Marks) now supported by the Configuration Service.

When created of offset close for a formerly forward starting position, the internal forward starting flag was set by mistake. This was fixed.

This is an internal refactoring

This is an internal refactoring that does not change the behavior of the Trade Manager application.

For dirty index quoted repos, changing the trade date did update the dirty index quote. This was corrected such that the dirty price is updated instead.
Problem importing CURCROSSES has been fixed.

Implemented a feature toggle so that the old dbi can have one of 4 different modes with regards to implicit joins in sqls. 0: Dont do implicit joins. 1: Do implicit joins (default). 2: Fail on implicit joins. 3: Fail ambiguous implicit joins.
Upgrade program fails when try install and clean up system table area - this have been removed and should be handled somewhere else.
Fixes for null reference
Reducing the number of FlexAnalytics service requests. No Impact on Business functionality.
Catch the exception and add telemetry log
All transactions, linked to embedded FX orders are now shown in the AM linked transactions applet.
Crash in Benchmark Calculation with FIPA mapping missing for some securities. Error was fixed.
An error in the calculation of synthetic FX hedge returns had the effect that inverted FX rates where used. The error has been corrected.
Using the field '* Maturity date (FX forwards)' for security generation didn't work. This has been corrected.
Fix total sum calculation of Nominal Values, Payment SC, Pay direction and Deliver/Receive securities in Netting Manager
We should be able to see why results are filtered away in the requests to the online service, using IMSTrace
Refactoring - no impact on clients
Changed the Web Api Template Editor window to be more responsive while testing requests
Renamed 2 column titles and a from title from "Mandate ..." to "Product ..."
Side effect has been fixed to ensure correct autoallocation is done when Total Collateral Result is sent for allocation
The fix suggested in this defect has been reverted. A new solution has been proposed on the defect D-76662.
Adds information in the Status column when an exception is encountered when executing the Compressed Benchmarks Service.
A non-released error was resolved to ensure that Asset manager Cache  API job can be executed
Strategy Manager: fixed Solvency2 unshocked DV inconsistent results

There were no CLAllow transaction created via create window for some positions when a lot was bought at par, (Put/Call price is par as well). In such case Interest Appreciation should not be calculated. However, CLA (based on factors) should be generated in this case. After this correction we continue with generation of CLA despite the fact that a lot is bought at par.
PoolFactorsData now is exposed to Front office applications

This correction changes the headers on the two return columns in the Synthetic FX Hedge Returns window. The text "RC" is removed from both headers and they are now "Base return" and "Price return". The window does not specify any reporting currency and thus it was a source of confusion that the headers had "RC" in them. Further, the number of decimals is changed from 8 to 12 to allow for higher precision.
This is an internal change. The change has no customer impact.
